entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Rain mixed with snow early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
